top35.why: Meets all acceptance thresholds (>=10 items total, >=6 items in RM3500-7000 window, >=2 items <=RM4500) and already structured for AI POD runtime.

fallback.why: No JSONL exists in repo; the richest fallback data lives in data/fallbackLaptops.json (73 rows) and covers the full acceptance window. Converting to JSONL preserves schema compatibility and PDPA posture.

alternatives.notes: Solid schema but lacks sub-RM4500 coverage; useful as secondary blend once lower-price entries added.
Gaming-focused slice; insufficient volume for canonical feeds but good for supplementary explorer cards.
